sourcesContent:
<script>

export default {
  name: 'App',

  data () {
    return {
      dialog: false,
      items: [
        {
          icon: 'home',
          text: 'Home',
          title: 'Back to Home page',
          active: true
        },
        {
          icon: 'info',
          text: 'About',
          title: 'About this demo',
          active: false
        },
        {
          icon: 'assignment_turned_in',
          text: 'Todos',
          title: 'Some stuff that needs doing',
          active: false
        },
        {
          icon: 'email',
          text: 'Contact',
          title: 'Our Contact info',
          active: false
        }
      ]
    }
  }
};
</script>

<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-card
      flat
      height="48px"
      tile
    >
      <v-toolbar
        dense
        dark
        color="primary"
      >
        <v-img
          src="../src/assets/logo_taurus_transparent.png"
          max-height="40px"
          max-width="40px"
        ></v-img>
        <v-toolbar-title class="pl-2">Pizzeria Taurus</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-toolbar-items>
          <v-btn
            v-for="item in items"
          >
            {{ item.text }}
          </v-btn>

        </v-toolbar-items>

      </v-toolbar>
    </v-card>



    <v-main>
      <router-view/>
    </v-main>

  </v-app>
</template>
